name: Old West Tycoon
description:
In a world where snakes have taken over, you are moments away from becoming a Sneeple.  When suddenly your damsel in distress named Partricica gets kidnapped by a rouge tumbleweed detective named Dr. Evil McSuper Doctor. Save the world, Sell Oil to snakes, Befriend the drills and be stronger together in your fight to get back PARTRICICA.

Controls:

Switch items: Scroll wheel or up and down arrow keys to switch between your placed structures.

Place items: Left click, once your oil is sufficient
